meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.0. The red needle points precisely to the 0.03 mark on the dial. The 0.00 mark is at 9 o'clock, and the dial increases clockwise. The 0.03 mark is at 12 o'clock, which is 3 segments of 36 degrees each (3 * 36 = 108 degrees) from the 0.00 mark.
